bibl.bibl: Semper, Carl. 1863. Reisebericht. Briefliche Mittheilung an A. Kölliker. Zeitschrift für wissenschaftliche Zoologie 13: 558–69.
bibl.idno: Rare books: Balfour library. SE: Two tables from this are in DAR 177: 135. Photocopy in research files (Semper). The whole annotated article is in the file, all numbered 135; the tables come after the letter. SI https://www.biodiversitylibrary.org/item/159284#page/628/mode/1up
